ModMetaData.name: [1.0] Project RimFactory 3.0 - Public Beta

ModMetaData.description: A compilation of all my old factory mods into one giant mod! Credits: Data disk and tape player textures by totobrother Wood crate texture by Chicken Plucker Robotic arm texture by Shotgunfrenzy Drone texture by Xen Chinese translation by Dango998
